title: Pixel 3 Upgraded to Android 10. PIN increases to 8 digits, MS Exchange/ActiveSynch set for 6 digits
content: I upgraded a Pixel 3 to Android 10 without issue.  PIN requirement from default Mail app was working w/6 digit PIN prior to upgrade.  Other devices continue to work with6 digit PIN configured in Microsoft Exchange/ActiveSynch.  Exchange is hosted at outlook.office.com by Microsoft.  After upgrade Mail requires 8 digit PIN to synch.  Deleting exchange account  changes requirement to 4 digit PIN.  Adding exchange account again requires 8 digit PIN.  Confirmed server setting require 6 digit PIN.
